headline: These Climate Solutions Stocks Have Turned Up the Heat in 2024. Can Their Rally Continue, or Will They Cool Off in 2025?
summary: This catalyst helped drive up shares of Lennox by more than 40%, while Trane Technologies' stock was up over 55%, easily beating the S&P 500's more than 25% rise.  Lennox is a leader in energy-efficient climate-control solutions.  Demand for its products, which include air conditioners, furnaces, heat pumps, and indoor air quality systems, has grown briskly this year.
